messages.itemOfTheMonthControlText: Become a Citizen today! Get the exclusive item of the month!

messages.statusCannotUpgradeText: Sorry, a citizenship for more than 2 years could not be bought
messages.itemOfTheMonthText:
This item is available only for Chobots who will buy the citizenship during this month!
You can always exchange it for 2000 Bugs by putting this item to garbage can in your wardrobe!
messages.wannaBeSpecial: Wanna be special? Join today and get one of these exclusive items
